item.description: Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1780; 09:46PM; 1646 W 51st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AsriIc; Vermont Square; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 12 minutes with no injuries reported. Crews contained the fire to the garage involved and prevented it from extending into the exposed structure. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E21 E221 E266 E34 SQ21 T21 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1780; 09:34PM; 1646 W 51st Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3AsriIc; Vermont Square; One story, single family dwelling with a detached garage. The garage is fully involved in fire and is exposing a back house as well. ; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E21 E221 E266 E34 SQ21 T21 T66; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Hazardous Materials - Fuel Leak; INC#1158; 02:45PM; Wb 210 Fy x Wheatland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3urBHQC; Shadow Hills; A traffic collision between a semi (now jack-knifed) vs auto resulted in approximately 100G fuel leak spilling across the freeway. The WB210 just east of Wheatland offramp has ALL lanes of traffic closed. This will be an extended duration operation (time unknown) and all drivers are advised to take alternate routes and check https://cad.chp.ca.gov/Traffic.aspx for the latest updates. No injuries reported. CHP Log# 1569. No further details; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC14 E17 E21 E221 E24 E287 E87 EM14 RA874 RA91 SQ21 SQ87 T21 T87; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0962; 01:06PM; 4867 W Melrose Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gjsRxu; East Hollywood; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire was contained to a storage shed behind the dwelling. The fire extended a detached garage and auto. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E229 E235 E261 E29 E41 E52 E6 RA829 T27 T29 T35 T61; CH9; 15 16; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0962; 12:48PM; 4867 W Melrose Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gjsRxu; East Hollywood; Well involved garage fire (at a two story, single family dwelling) which is impinging on another building (reports of detached garage). Firefighters are in the offensive mode. ; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E229 E235 E52 E6 T29 T35; CH9; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0652; 09:52AM; 9420 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nDu1a8; North Hills; KNOCKDOWN: 29 firefighters extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. Assisted by automatic fire sprinklers, crews held the fire to the unit of origin with no extension to the 2nd floor or adjacent units. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E290 E75 E81 EM14 RA70 RA75 RA89 T75 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0652; 09:35AM; 9420 N Noble Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nDu1a8; North Hills; Two story condos with fire in one unit on the 1st floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 7; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E275 E290 E75 E81 EM14 RA70 RA75 RA89 T75 T90; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1811; 10:53PM; 11223 W Lucerne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3yfCHIz; Del Rey; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 18 minutes with no injuries reported. No further details.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E292 E43 E63 RA43 RA892 T5 T92; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1811; 10:35PM; 11223 W Lucerne Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3nGkiQy; Del Rey; One story, single family dwelling (under construction) with fire showing. There are four additional residences under construction on the lot which are exposed. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 62; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E292 E43 E63 RA43 RA892 T5 T92; CH9; 1; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Brush Fire; INC#1637; 09:58PM; 1052 W Upland Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3afb2Q8; San Pedro; KNOCKDOWN: All active fire is extinguished and firefighters will continue to conduct mop up operations for any remaining hot spots. The fire was contained to less than one acre. No structures damaged and no injuries reported. No further details and no further updates are anticipated for this incident.; FS 36; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 AO2 BC13 BC6 CW3A CW3B E101 E112 E248 E285 E290 E36 E38 E48 E85 EM13 H0D H0E H1 H2 H4 H5 H6 HA1 HA2 HA4 HA5 HA6 RA36 T85 T90; CH5; 14; Margaret Stewart
